title: RandormatorLead Is Back!
body:
this comedian is back from an unfair day ban from riot because he posted too much! This is the best league of legends comedian on the boards and is back posting in 4 hours!! so come read his posts.
WHY RIOT????!!
UNFAIR, NO BAN, UNFAIR NO BAN
Post about randormatorleads retun NOW!!!! and let everyone know he is coming back!

replies.body: I can assure you that Boards suspensions are not given lightly, and that this suspension was not given in error. Please familiarise yourself with the Boards Rules in order to avoid any escalations of the punishments.
